name: Wizard of foam Magic
description:
Wizard of foam magic is an arena survival game set in a fantasy world, the player will take control of a magician from a mysterious order and go to the arena in order to defeat various creatures that will try to defeat you.
You will have to fight in arenas with a large number of monsters using various spells.
To win and survive in the arena during the timer action, you will need to destroy monsters and dodge them using dash.
The ability to identify the most dangerous creatures and eliminate them in the first place will also help you win.
